channel.title: personal on Nirant Kasliwal
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Nirant Kasliwal

item.description: Me in 10 seconds I’ve been doing NLP (Natural Language Processing) for a bit, and did Computer Vision, Embedded ML and Predictive Analytics before. Even wrote a book about NLP. I talk a lot about it too. I write blogs about career, technology and business: Newsletter Surat, Gujarat native. I now live in Bengaluru. I’m always happy to help those who ask crisp and descriptive questions. Write to me at hello [at] nirantk.
